Boba.BobaDescription: A contemporary teahouse serving a wide selection of bubble tea, fresh fruit drinks, and delicious snacks.

Combining the smooth flavors of bubble tea with the electric sounds of EDM, we're adding something truly unique to Falls Church, Virginia. Located in the Eden Center shopping complex, TeaDM Lounge is bringing the best tea and coffee from around the world right to your neighborhood.
Relaxed place serving a wide variety of bubble teas, plus coffee, ice cream and snacks.

Chunky Cup is a local bubble tea and fries shop that seeks to bring a high-spirited atmosphere and enthusiasm located in the DMV. We insist that customers will experience made-to-order freshly brewed tea and coffee using our advanced espresso machine.
Gong cha is an international beverage franchise specializing in freshly prepared premium tea, bubble tea and coffee.
